Detailed Description

Octree cell data during traversal.

Constant.

To be made during each level of tree descent, so storage is avoided, except to hold one at the root.

Subcell numbering: 

    y z       6 7
    |/   2 3  4 5
     -x  0 1
in binary: 
    y z           110 111
    |/   010 011  100 101
     -x  000 001

See also:
OctreeBound

OctreeDimensions
